I am a chatbot created to assist you with your queries.
I am an AI chatbot here to help you with any questions you may have.
AI stands for Artificial Intelligence. It enables machines to mimic human intelligence and perform tasks that require human-like reasoning.
Machine Learning is a subset of AI that involves training machines to learn from data and make predictions without explicit programming.

patterns: How can I use this app?
What are the features of this app?
Can you tell me about the app?
responses: This app allows you to chat with a bot and view your chat history. Just type your message and hit 'Send' to start.
You can chat with the bot by typing your questions and the bot will respond. You can also view your chat history from the sidebar.

patterns: Can I talk to a human?
Is there a customer support number?
responses: You can reach customer support via email at support@edunet.com.
For support, please email us at support@edunet.com, and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible.
